Text:
Hi I am trying to collect all albums, missing nr 14, 20 to 26, and 30. Can anyone help me?

Big thanks to mdusanjay for his good jobb.

Every few days I come here and search for Lucky Luke, I always find that you uploaded some, You set me happy "mdusanjay" as I'm sure it happens for many others... One little question "Will you upload the complete collection one by one?"

Thank you very much

complete collection is difficult mate..as it need translation..as cinebook publishes everymonth u can expect the same..actual credit goes to the original scanners...i am mere an uploader who wishes to make everyone happy..
You've done it, you made us really happy, waiting for your next upload :)
